home.heroSubtitle: Induruwa - Newest Coffee Experience – Lavazza Coffee, Fresh Pastries & More..
home.aboutPara1: Welcome to The Coffee Shop by AIDA Group, the newest and trendiest coffee shop in Induruwa, Sri Lanka. We serve authentic Lavazza coffee, brewed to perfection on our professional LaCimbali espresso machine, paired with a wide selection of freshly baked pastries, signature cakes, fresh juices, and smoothies.
home.aboutPara2: Our café is designed as a work-friendly, relaxing, and aesthetic space, perfect for travelers, locals, and digital nomads looking for a cozy spot with WiFi. As part of the trusted AIDA Group, known for over 50 yearsin hospitality, we bring you not just coffee—but a full lifestyle experience in the heart of Induruwa.

menu.menu1Subtitle: Freshly brewed, aromatic coffee crafted from the finest beans — the heart of every great conversation.
menu.menu2Subtitle: Juicy, flavorful burgers made to pair perfectly with your favorite coffee or drink — comfort on a plate.
menu.menu3Subtitle: More than a café — a warm space where friends, locals, and travelers connect and share moments together.
menu.menu4Subtitle: Freshly brewed, aromatic coffee crafted from the finest beans — the heart of every great conversation.
menu.menu5Subtitle: Join our vibrant events — live music, art shows, and more.
menu.menu6Subtitle: Experience our chefs cook your meal right before your eyes

blog.title: OUR BLOG
blog.text: Our blog brings together stories from coffee culture, travel, and AIDA’s legacy in hospitality. Best Coffee Shops in Induruwa – Why AIDA’s Coffee Shop

footer.coffeetext: Aida Coffee Shop is your go-to place for specialty coffee, artisan pastries, and a wide range of beverages. Our coffee is carefully roasted and brewed to perfection, creating a cozy atmosphere. Enjoy rich flavors, friendly service, and the perfect space to relax or connect brewed fresh every day.
